text: Glad I met you. Don't forget to give me a ring - any time - knock twice and ask for Bawley, what? I don't know when that will be,said John.I shall be busy for a while,cleaning up after Master bloody Munyard.
handwritten_text: Glad s met you.Don't forget to gioe me a ring. anytime-knock toice and ast for Bawley,what?
name: Midael Uaubilaes
